member.name: WCM_POLICY_VALUE
member.summary: The WCM_POLICY_VALUE structure contains information about the current value of a policy.

member.name: WCM_POLICY_VALUE.fValue
member.summary: True if the policy is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: WCM_POLICY_VALUE.fIsGroupPolicy
member.summary: True if the current value was provided by Group Policy; otherwise, false.
